node.node: Hey there, I'm selling pizzas.
I knew you'd be back.
Ah... back for more, I see.
Great~! Here, take a look.
You'll be back...
I pulled you out of a scraped heap of burning metal. You're lucky to be alive.
You were holding this when I found you.
You got a Knife!
I assume you remember how to use it. (Stick 'em with the pointy end.)
The only way out is up. Head north to the castle... grant us release from this fate.
Beware, the spirits of the Royal Knights have fled their bodies. They will attack all who cross their path.
The king hasn't been seen outside his chambers for over 1000 years.
As we speak, the land sinks deeper into this sea of primordial ether.
In a few days time, there will be no trace left of our great nation.
Monsters from below have risen to the surface to claim our remains.
Head north to the castle. I will meet you again there.

event.node: I can equip upgrades to your gear for you.

node.text: Whatta ya say? Upgrade your gear?

node.node: Come back soon!
Let me know if you change your mind.
Oh! You're finally up.
Levi brought you in here. He's up the hill.
You were all beat up and bloodied. You should really go and thank him.
Anyway... you don't have any money on you, so get out of here.
Hold SPACEBAR to use your suit's boost function and SHIFT to use the reverse boost function.
On top of letting you go fast as hell, the boost function will allow you to: cross chasms, and dodge enemy attacks.
At the start of a boost you will absorb most enemy attacks. This Perfect Dodge will redirect that energy into your HP and EP.
Boosting will overheat your suit if you use it for too long, so be careful not to use it for too long!
